title: Zioncheck Rules
text:
Round 1: 2 sets (6)
Round 2: 1 run 1 set (7)
Round 3: 2 runs (8)
Round 4: 3 sets (9)
Round 5: 1 run 2 sets (10)
Round 6: 2 runs 1 set (11)
Round 7: 3 runs (12)
Round 8: 2 runs 2 sets (14 must use draw card)

Sets = 3 of a kind (diff suits)
Runs = 4 in a row (same suit) 

Aces = high or low
Jokers = wild

Points 
2-9 = 5pts
10-K = 10pts 
A = 15pts
Joker = 50pts

title: Customer Reactivations
text:
1. Identify the breweries we want to use as targets 1 week in advance <— Sylvia to write query to sort breweries by count of deactivated users desc. 
2. Post to redash.  publish.
3. Megan OH <— run query for reactivated customers.
4. Go to Excel to ensure we only target unique customers.  Don’t want to send 3 different emails to a single user.
5. Construct and send email
